about_the_game:
The C.I. Puppet Friends™ star in their first ever full video game: Landon's Puzzle ParTAY™!

"Hey everyone, It's me Landon! I'm inviting you to my first ever Puzzle ParTAY! (not a 'party')

I just know you'll have lots of tons of fun, so come on down! (chips and dip not included)"

-Landon

Landon's Puzzle ParTAY is a fast-paced, arcade-style, time-attack, puzzle game! This game features various puzzle types with a C.I. Puppet Friends twist!

- Put together classic puzzles with Landon!

- Help Josie cross different terrains!

- Guide Chef Paisano through the grocery store to find all of the ingredients!

- Help (paper doll) Landon find the right pose!

- Find hidden secrets! 

All while being cheered on by your favorite Puppet Friends!

In this game, you'll race against the clock to complete all sorts of different puzzles! 

Including:

  • Jigsaw puzzles

  • Mazes

  • Slide puzzles

  • Problem solving

  • Crosswords

  • Patterns

  • Platforming challenges as bonus rounds

  • And more to come!

Each puzzle gets more difficult as you complete them. After your first puzzle, each round will have you race through with a completely different pattern. Each puzzle you solve adds 1 point to your score! How many puzzles can you solve before running out of time?

Compete with others in an online leaderboard to see how many puzzles you can solve! 

- Unlock special badges with each rank, as you race for the high score!

- Create your own profile, with your favorite character as an avatar!

(remember, chips and dip are not included, stop asking, Elvin)

short_description: Landon's Puzzle ParTAY™ is a game where you complete puzzles as fast as you can without running out of time! Enjoy all of the fun and wacky minigames with a C.I. Puppet Friends™ flair! Create your own profile and compete for the high score!
